page.title: 13Occupations in Landscove
page.content: There area few people in the area who earn money by working at or from their homes.Greenheart is a family {woodworking}business making doors and windows to special designs.Mr.Francis makes exquisite{models}of railway engines and sells them in London.Mrs.Webb shears her own sheep,spins the{wool}on a traditional spinning wheel and then dyes the wool with natural dyes and knits to specialised designs for Liberty of London.Mr.Church runs a small caravan and{camping}site behind the village stores.Mr.Seal is a Ministry of Agriculture Inspector who often takes soil samples from local farms and enforces the Ministry Regulations. Mr.Walters is an architect who works at home but takes his plans all over the world ,particularly to America.
